proposing_alliance_id.description: ID of the alliance initiating the merge proposal

receiving_alliance_id.description: ID of the alliance that needs to approve the merge

surviving_alliance_id.description: ID of the alliance that will remain active after the merge

merging_alliance_id.description: ID of the alliance that will be absorbed/disbanded

status.description: Current status of the merge proposal

proposed_by_nation_id.description: ID of the nation that initiated this proposal

message.description: Optional message from the proposing alliance

expires_at.description: When this proposal expires if not responded to (7 days from creation)

responded_at.description: When the proposal was responded to

responded_by_nation_id.description: ID of the nation that responded to this proposal
